verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G3056>teaching<s%> <S%G746>of<s%> the first <S%G746>principles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let us press <S%G5342>on<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G5047>perfection<s%> â€” <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

of the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G909>baptisms,<s%> <S%G5037>of<s%> laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G5495>hands,<s%> of <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G2917>of<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2917>of<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> will we <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2010>permits.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> concerning those who <S%G5461>were<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G5461>enlightened<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of <S%G1431>the<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>
<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> <S%G4487>the<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>age<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> then fell <S%G3895>away,<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> renew <S%G340>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance;<s%> seeing they <S%G388>crucify<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2532>again,<s%> and put him to open <S%G3856>shame.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> has <S%G4095>drunk<s%> the <S%G5205>rain<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> brings <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G2532>a<s%> crop <S%G2111>suitable<s%> for <S%G1565>them<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> sake it is also <S%G1090>tilled,<s%> <S%G3335>receives<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> if it <S%G1627>bears<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5146>thistles,<s%> it is <S%G96>rejected<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> being <S%G2671>cursed,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G2740>burned.<s%>

<S%G1161>But,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> of better <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G1487>salvation,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> though <S%G2980>we<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> like <S%G3779>this.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous,<s%> so as to <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1731>showed<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> in that you <S%G1247>served<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> still do serve <S%G1247>them.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> We desire <S%G1937>that<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> may <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G4710>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G4136>fullness<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> even <S%G891>to<s%> the <S%G5056>end,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3361>won't<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3576>sluggish,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of those <S%G2816>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherited<s%> the <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1861>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> made a <S%G1861>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1893>since<s%> he <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G3173>greater,<s%> he <S%G3660>swore<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%>
<S%G2229>saying,<s%> <S%G3375>"Surely<s%> <S%G2127>blessing<s%> I will <S%G2127>bless<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiplying<s%> I will <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G4571>you.<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>Thus,<s%> having patiently <S%G3114>endured,<s%> he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> a <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G2532>one,<s%> and in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G485>dispute<s%> of <S%G846>theirs<s%> the <S%G3727>oath<s%> is <S%G4009>final<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G951>confirmation.<s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> this way <S%G2316>God,<s%> being <S%G1014>determined<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> more <S%G4054>abundantly<s%> to the <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> the <S%G276>immutability<s%> <S%G1012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1012>counsel,<s%> <S%G3315>interposed<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath;<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>immutable<s%> <S%G4229>things,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie,<s%> we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3874>a<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>encouragement,<s%> who have fled for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> to take <S%G2902>hold<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> set before <S%G4295>us.<s%>

<S%G3739>This<s%> hope we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul,<s%> a hope <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G949>steadfast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which is <S%G2082>within<s%> the <S%G2665>veil;<s%>

<S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1525>as<s%> a <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> having <S%G1096>become<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>
